name: 透
text:
おーい
花火じゃなくて、こっち見ろー
trans:
Heeey.
Forget the fireworks; look over heeere.

name: 円香
text:
……
なんか焦げ臭いんだけど
trans:
...
You know, something smells like burning.

name: 円香
text:
あ……
浅倉、ちょっと近づけすぎ
trans:
Ah...
Asakura, you're a little too close to it.

name: 透
text: え？　早く乾かした方がいいじゃん
trans: Huh? But it'd be good to dry it off faster, right?

name: 円香
text:
焦げたら意味ないでしょ
借りてる衣装だって意識ある？
trans:
If you burn it, what's the point?
You're aware we don't actually own these outfits, right?

name: 円香
text:
はいはい
その言葉は聞き飽きた
trans:
Yeah, yeah.
I could throw up hearing you say that again.

name: 小糸
trans: They're not really drying, are they...!

name: 雛菜
text:
やっぱりドライヤーじゃ、
乾燥機の代わりにならなくない～？
trans: I guess hairdryers don't cut it like an actual proper dying machine would, huh～?

name: 円香
text:
乾きにくそうな部分に、
当てておくだけでもマシでしょ
trans: Maybe if you focus the parts that dry out slower? You'd be making an improvement over literally nothing.

name: 雛菜
text:
でも古いのだから風弱いし
お金入れないと動かないし～……
trans: But they're all ancient and they barely blow, and they don't work unless you put the money in～...

name: 透
trans: Higuchi, I don't have any more 10-yens.

name: 円香
text: 千円崩してくるから待ってて
trans: I'll break a thousand, so wait here.

name: 小糸
text:
あ、円香ちゃんのドライヤーまだ動いてるでしょ
わたし両替してくるよ！
trans: Ah, Madoka-chan, your dryer's still running, isn't it? I'll go find the coin exchange!

name: 円香
text:
ああ……両替機は無いみたいだから
自販機で水でも買ってくれる？
trans: Aah... don't think there was a coin exchange around here. Maybe go buy some water at the vending machine for me?

name: 円香
trans: ...Hinana? What are you clearing up for?

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜のは干しといて自然乾燥させる～
じゃ、部屋戻るね～？
trans:
I'm just gonna let mine dry out with the power of nature～
Going back to my room, then, 'kay～?

name: 円香
text: それじゃ朝までに乾かないでしょ
trans: Then it's not gonna be dry until morning.

name: 小糸
text:
円香ちゃん！
お水と……お釣り！
trans:
Madoka-chan!
Your water and... your change!

name: 円香
text:
ありがと
あと、小糸は雛菜を引き止めておいて
trans:
Thanks.
Also, you need to find and restrain Hinana right now.

name: 円香
text:
20円で１分を続けてても意味ないでしょ
100円玉なら５分使える
trans: There's no actual point in feeding it 20 yen for the next minute forever. If you give it a 100, it'll give you five minutes straight.

name: 円香
text: ほら、雛菜のも100円入れたから、持って
trans: Wow, look. I put 100 yen in yours too, Hinana. Take it.

name: 小糸
text:
あ……えっと、
雛菜ちゃん、もういなくて……

name: 円香
text: 衣装も置きっぱなしで？
trans: And she just left her outfit here?

name: 円香
text:
……
それじゃ、このドライヤーは小糸に
trans:
...
Fine, then. This dryer's yours now, Koito.

name: 小糸
text: うん……雛菜ちゃんの乾かす？
trans: Sure... want me to dry Hinana-chan's?

name: 円香
text: いいから自分のに集中して
trans: It's fine. Just concentrate on your own.

name: 透
text: 樋口の足元、バッタっぽいやつ
trans: By your feet. Some grasshopper thing.

name: 透
text:
大丈夫
まだ床いるし
trans:
You're fine.
It's still on the floor.

name: 小糸
text:
な、何か掴まえられるもの
探してくる……待ってて……！
trans: I──I'm gonna go and find something to trap it with... just hold on...!

name: 透
text:
無理無理
樋口、逃げた方がいいよ
trans:
No way no way.
Higuchi, I think your best option is to run.

name: 円香
text:
両手がドライヤーでふさがってるの
見てわからない……？
trans: I'm stuck here with dryers in both my hands. Can you not tell looking at me...?

name: 透
text:
おーい
あっち行けー……

name: 小糸
text:
ど、どうしたの！？
大丈夫……？

name: 小糸
text:
え、えっと
バケツ、見つけたけど……
trans:
U──um,
I found, um, a bucket...

name: 小糸
text:
つ、掴まえた……！
もう大丈夫だよ……！
